name: Cat and Cat (WIP)
description:
In this cat puzzle game you have to trace a route over a 7x5 grid for two cats to make them arrive home. On the route, each cat interacts automatically and differently with the elements laid in the grid.

This a WIP project and the current release is the very first prototype. I am really looking forward to any feedback, and especially on the game main mechanic:

  • Is it fun / could be fun (if improved)?
  • Is it challenging?
  • Would it scale well (like 100 levels)?
  • Would you considering adding additional mechanics (I had also considered cats abilities could be represented by cards and the players could try to switch those cards from one cat to the other).

Future versions will ship improvements such as:

  • Improved graphic design and art.
  • Feedback game to player to better understand what is going on (animations / sound)
  • Level design fitting to themes (e.g. city, park, zoo, etc...).
  • Story.

I hope you enjoy it!
